name: Day in the Life (ej.dickerson)
description:
This game is produced EJ Dickerson and Troy Humphreys.  The game was made for Kentucky Country Day School's Game Design Class>

In this game, You will be going through a day in the life of  a  AAU basketball star. on the day of a summer game. You'll have a series of  options to choose from to determine your performance in the game. Good Luck!!!

Make the best decisions for your day to have the best game possible!!
